韡韡韡
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 𩏬
Связанный символ (и): 𩏬

韡字的基本解释

韡
wěi
〔韡韡〕光明美丽的样子，如“常棣之华，鄂不韡韡。”

韡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》于鬼切，上尾，云。］
亦作“1”。亦作“鞾2”。亦作“1”。亦作“1”。
(1)美。
(2)光明盛大貌。
[②]［xuē］
同“鞾1”。
靴子。

韡字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【韋字部】　韡； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1395第18
【唐韻】于鬼切【集韻】【韻會】羽鬼切，?音偉。【說文】本作?，盛也。从?，韋聲。【唐韻】華盛貌。【詩·小雅】常棣之華，鄂不韡韡。【傳】韡韡，光明也。　【集韻】【類篇】書作?。

考證：〔【詩·小雅】棠棣之華，鄂不韡韡。〕　謹照原文棠棣改常棣。
韡字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
韡字的起名意思

形容光明盛大、美丽的样子。如：萼木韡韡。——《诗·小雅·常棣》。

Wei
Basic explanation of words
Wei
wěi
[Weiwei] Bright and beautiful appearance, such as "Changdi Zhihua, Hubei is not Weiwei."
Wei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" Yu Guiqie, Shangwei, Yun. ]
Also known as "1". Also known as "Yan 2". Also known as "1". Also called "1".
(1) Beauty.
(2) Bright and grand appearance.
[②] [xuē]
Same as "鞾1".
boots.
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Wei Character Department】　韡; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1395 18
[Tang Yun] Yu Guiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yu Guiqie,? Yinwei. [Said the text] This work?, Sheng Ye. Cong?, Wei Sheng. [Tang Yun] Huasheng appearance. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Changdi Zhihua, Ebuweiwei. [Biography] Wei Wei, bright.　【Jiyun】【Classes】Books?. Textual research: [[Poem·Xiaoya] Tangdi Zhihua, E Buwei Wei. 〕　I would like to change Changdi according to the original.
Wei

Wei
Name meaning
Describe the bright, grand and beautiful appearance. Such as: Calyx wood worm. -"Poetry·Xiaoya·Changdi".
wěi
1) цветущий, пышный
韡萼 пышные венчики цветов
2) вм. 炜 (блестящий, сверкающий)
